Header: Suspect arrested with dust tea worth over Rs. 5 million
Content: Colombo (News 1st): A suspect has been arrested with 336,585 kilograms of dust tea in Aduruppu Veediya, Colombo.Â  The dust tea is valued at over Rs. 5 million. Police Special Task Force noted that the seized dust tea has been handed over to the Aduruppu Veediya Police Station.
